Just for the record, I have never charged anyone a penny for what I do. If =
I can reach a lost loved one for=A0someone and maybe give them (the living)=
=A0 some closure, it is all the=A0compensation that I will ever need. I was=
 at the prison as an invited guest.
Steve=A0




__________________________=

s.com

 Box Demo at Moundsville WV

Dinner =
Made Easy Newsletter - Simple Meal Ideas for Your Family. Sign Up Now!
Well=
, everything is done for a reason, I believe this gift of communication has=
 been given to us=A0for a reason, not just to sell tickets, but to help our=
selves still in the world, by moving those other's=A0on, we in a sense move=
 ourselves on to better and higher vibration.

In a message dated 5/27/2009=
 6:18:50 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:


=

We all have our own beliefs. I make no judgements on the living or the dea=
d. I just communicate and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. Many,many s=
pirits have asked me for help. If they can help themselves, they do not see=
m to know how. The prisoners believe that they would be trapped. if they di=
ed there. Are they imprisoned by their own beliefs?
Steve

=A0I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I think that's Hollywood.=
=A0The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is you get the evidence =
you expect to get, so it will tend to support the concept of stuck souls. W=
hen I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, and hauntings are for=
 show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another. 

=A0I did a recordi=
ng at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "ghost--right behind you"=
. I was recording open air with the test board running.=A0 

=A0Frank-S

Well, stand outside the thing, and help those po=
or souls out, here they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are =
asking for help.=A0 Shame on them, don't they realize =A0how many lost soul=
s there are out there, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them=
,)=A0 were I to name all the tribes, country, religions, throughout the yea=
rs, people that died trapped, in various places over century's, and yes the=
re are thousand's of them in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their ow=
n making, no progression, no light, no hope, without people they love, and =
who=A0wait still loving them, they exist in these dark places without God.=
=A0 This mission should be to help them get back to God, back to the light =
of God, light of Universe however, we want to call it, but in that light is=
 love and happiness.=A0 Just my take, sf

In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42=
:33 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



Yes,=
 you need special permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a =
guest of Eastern Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe m=
e when I say "it ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would apprecia=
te me=A0releasing the inmates=A0before their eternal sentence has been serv=
ed..
Steve

In a message =
dated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M.. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yaho=
o.com writes:



Unfortunately I did not get to attempt to cross them. Afte=
r my demonstration, another group that was also there started complaining t=
hat the box made too much noise and was hendering their investigation so I =
turned it off. I wouldn't want my direct=A0communication with the deceased =
inmates to mess up their EVP work, now would I? I apoligized and put it awa=
y for the rest of the night.
=A0According to the prison staff, the inmates =
firmly believed that if they died in prison their souls would be forever=A0=
trapped there. This belief was so strong that the prison officials would ta=
ke the elderly inmates who were dying of natural causes to=A0a=A0local hosp=
ital so they would'nt have to die in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were w=
ell founded. =A0=A0=A0

 they can start to work on making up for things on the other side.=A0 You f=
olks should go up there again, and hold a small prayer vigil for them, of c=
ourse they would no longer be ghosts trapped there, but there are plenty mo=
re around. sf

In a message dated 5/27/2009 12:10:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight =
Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



I was invited to spend the nig=
ht in the West Virginia Penitentiary this past weekend... I was asked to gi=
ve a short demonstration with my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside t=
he prison surrounded by concrete and steel, the radio could not pick up any=
 radio stations in manual mode. I wasn't sure how this might effect the dem=
onstration. I was pleasantly surprised with the results. I recorded the ses=
sion and the results can be heard at this link. http://www.youtube. com/wat=
ch? v=3DKwDYu4RULlk
